attributes.death: Killed by Wildfire explosion during the Battle of the Blackwater.
attributes.title: Matthos Seaworth

sections.In the books:
In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, Matthos is the third of Davos' seven sons, and serves his father proudly on the ship, the ''Black Betha''. Four of Davos' sons serve in Davos army - Dale, Allard, Matthos, and Marc - and all four are killed in the Battle of the Blackwater. In the TV series, these four sons have been functionally condensed into Matthos. InÂ [[Histories & Lore]]: [[Robert's Rebellion (Histories & Lore)|Robert's Rebellion]], Davos states that Matthos is his only son, which indicates that his three youngest sons from the book - Devan, Stannis and Steffon - do not exist in the TV series.

"Matthos" is pronounced "Math-os", not "Mat-ohs".
